-   **Inclusion Tip of the Day** (1 min) – Julie
    -   **Avoid the phrase “assume good intent” when describing people’s behavior**, this has been weaponized and used to gaslight and hurt people of colour, especially Black people. - [Tara Robertson on LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/posts/tararobertson_after-reading-some-really-hateful-comments-activity-6927971647371051009-Cdh0/)
    -   Resource: [How “Good Intent” Undermines Diversity and Inclusion](https://thebias.com/2017/09/26/how-good-intent-undermines-diversity-and-inclusion/), by Annalee Flower, H/T Matt Fisher
